{{also|Erste}} ==German== {{ordinalbox|de|0.|1.|2.|nullte|zweite|card=eins}} ===Alternative forms=== * {{l|de|1.}} {{qualifier|abbreviation}} * {{l|de|ehrste}} {{qualifier|obsolete}} ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|goh|ērist}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*airist}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈeːɐ̯stə/}} * {{audio|de|De-erste.ogg|audio}} ===Ordinal number=== {{head|de|numeral}} # {{cln|de|ordinal numbers}} [[first]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-adj-notcomp|erst|pred=-}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ====Coordinate terms==== {{de-ordinals}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Erster}}, {{l|de|Erste}} * {{l|de|ersterer}} * {{l|de|erste Wahl}} * {{l|de|in erster Linie}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|erst}} * {{l|de|zuerst}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} * {{R:DWDS}} {{topics|de|One}} ---- ==Ido== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|io|de|erst}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|io|/ˈɛɾ.ste/|/ˈɛɾs.te/}} ===Adverb=== {{io-adv}} # {{qualifier|of time}} not [[before]], not [[until]] {{gloss|then}}, [[only]] {{gloss|not earlier than}}, [[for]] the [[first]] [[time]] #: {{ux|io|Me venos '''erste''' morge.|I '''won't''' come '''before''' tomorrow.}} ====Usage notes==== *''ne ante'' cannot be used in place of ''erste'', since *''ne ante'' would be a preposition just like {{m|io|ante}}, not an adverb. ''"Me venos *ne ante morge"'' would be totally gibberish since the *''ne ante'' would effect the adverb (''morge''), not the verb (''venos''). Instead, one could use ''"Me venos morge, ne ante"'', which would be correct. ---- ==Old Frisian== ===Adjective=== {{head|ofs|adjective}} # [[first]] [[Category:Old Frisian ordinal numbers]]
